'''Windan''' was a term used by some [[Avari]] to describe themselves. It is unknown if the name "Windan" was applied o a particular group of Avari specifically or to all Avari as a whole. 
==Etymology==
It is an [[Avarin]] word meaning "the People". It derives from [[Primitive Quendian]] ''[[kwende|kwendÄ«]]''.<ref name=Author>{{WJ|Author}}, Note 9, p. 410</ref>
